## IPoses interface

The detected hand poses.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IPoses 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [fist](./yoha.iposes.fist.md) | boolean | Fist gesture. Fingers form a fist. |
|  [pinch](./yoha.iposes.pinch.md) | boolean | Pinch gesture. Tip of index finger and tip of thumb touch. |
